fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
-  At the beginning of the game, one player from each faction will be given the ability to hire you once. This prioritizes Head roles (ie: Town Power, Mafia Head). Neutral roles do not get the option to hire you, except for all Neutral Killings. Otherwise, the player is chosen randomly.
- When someone hires you, you will kill the target they chose instead of your own.
- When someone hires you, you gain control and roleblock immunity.
- If you are hired multiple times in one night, you will carry out all kills.
- You will not kill yourself nor other Peasants. Peasants do not get to hire you.

fields.name: Destiny:
fields.value: Live to see at least half of the town dead. This must include all players who had the option to hire you.

fields.name: Goal:
fields.value: Have each living Peasant fulfill their Destiny.
